about_the_game:
Stand out from the crowd in Worms Revolution with the Customisation Pack.

Customisation Pack Includes


  • Exclusive new theme - The Junkyard.
  • 5 new lethal physics objects - Car Battery, Pliers, Toxic Canister, Hot Air Gun & Anti-Freeze.
  • 7 new hats - Bandana, Gear Stick, Tyre, Afro, Flat Cap, Rapper Hat & Backwards Baseball Hat.
  • 7 new trinkets including - Saxaphone, Spray Can, Lump Hammer, License Plate, Oil Can, Spark Plug & Oversized Clock.
  • 6 new gravestones including: Hub Cap, Washing Machine, Gold Record, Headstone with White Rose, Bucket Seat & Trash Can.

name: Worms Revolution - Customization Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP
  • Processor:Dual Core CPU
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:VIDIA GeForce 8600 GT (256 MB), Intel HD3000 or Radeon HD 3650 (512 MB)
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

esrb.descriptors: Cartoon Violence, Comic Mischief, Mild Language.

oflc.descriptors: Mild comedic violence, crude humour and coarse language, Gaming experience may change online
